DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study compare amount implant marginal bone loss radiographically probe depth thin thick mucosa group receive machine collar implant . Null hypothesis mucosa thickness affect implant marginal bone loss implant smooth collar .
DOC.brief_title: Influence Mucosa Tissue Thickness Marginal Bone Loss Implants With Smooth Collars
DOC.detailed_description: Twenty eight adult patient fulfill inclusion criterion divide 2 group base upon mucosa thickness ( < 2 mm ≥2 mm ) . A signed write informed consent obtain subject . Subjects screen treat informed consent obtain . Patient information protect accord privacy regulation federal Health Insurance Portability Accountability Act 1996 ( HIPAA ) . The enrolled patient receive implant 1 mm polish collar . Implants restore 4 ( ±1 ) month placement . Outcome analyse perform 1 ( ±1 month ) year load clinical radiographic parameter evaluate compare clinical outcome group . The primary outcome implant marginal bone loss probe depth clinical radiographic measurement .
DOC.criteria: Male Female Aged ≥18 In need one dental implant Maxillary Mandibular area , anterior , premolar , 1st molar tooth Natural adjacent teeth Bone height ≥10mm Bone width ≥5mm Good oral hygiene Stable periodontium Willingness fulfill study requirement Need bone augmentation Need one dental implant 2nd 3rd molar tooth Current smoker quit smoke less one year Pregnant plan get pregnant Uncontrolled diabetes ( HbA1C > 7 ) Medical condition may influence outcome study ( neurologic psychiatric disorder , systemic infection ) Current use oral bisphosphonates History IV bisphosphonates History radiation therapy head neck area within 4 year Poor oral hygiene ( plaque score 40 % base O'Leary plaque score ) Once group fill , subject meet criterion group exclude
